#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

#define DEBUG(x) cout<<#x<<"="<<x<<endl;

inline int F(int i) { return (i+3)/4; }
inline int G(int i) { return (i+1)/2; }

int main() {
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--) {
        int n, m, w, c;
        scanf("%d %d %d %d", &n, &m, &w, &c);

        int i=0, j=0, k=0;
        bool done=false;

        for(i=c; i>=0; i--) {
            if(i+F(i)<=n && m+w>=F(i)) {
                int rem=n-i;
//DEBUG(i);
                for(j=min(w, 2*m); j>=0; j--) {
                    if(j+G(j)<=rem && G(j)<=m) {
//DEBUG(j);
                        for(k=m; k>=G(j); k--) {
                            if(k+j>=F(i) && k+j<=rem) {
                                done=true;
                                break;
                            } else if(k+j<F(i)) break;
                        }
                    }
                    if(done) break;
                }
            }
            if(done) break;
        }

        printf("%d %d %d\n", k, j, i);
    }
    return 0;
}
